title.rendered: World-Renowned Urogynecologists Bring Top-Caliber Intimate Care to Beverly Hills

content.rendered:
Kimble Center for Intimate Cosmetic Surgery and Sonnet 79 Product Line Now Available

Elegance is when the inside is as beautiful as the outside.”

— Dr. Kimble

CALABASAS, CA, UNITED STATES, June 12, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — The Kimble Center for Intimate Cosmetic Surgery, operated by Drs. David and Alexis May Kimble, is thrilled to announce the opening of their new Beverly Hills location. The state-of-the-art center, beautifully appointed with the luxury of a 5-star spa, is dedicated to providing comprehensive intimate care and celebrating feminine beauty.

Located at 421 N Beverly Drive, Suite 260, Beverly Hills, CA 90210, the Kimble Center offers an extensive range of surgical procedures, including cosmetic genital surgery, vaginal reconstructive surgery, complex prolapse repairs, and advanced robotic surgeries for endometriosis and pelvic pain. Drs. Kimble incorporate the latest innovative technologies, such as lasers, radio frequency, and microneedling, to create a cutting-edge, welcoming environment for their female patients.

In addition to their surgical expertise, Drs. Kimble have developed Sonnet 79, a luxurious intimate skin care line for the discerning woman who demands the highest-end, high-performing formulations without compromising on luxury or the finest ingredients for her delicate intimate skin. This five-piece collection includes the 24K Gold Cleansing Mask, 24K Gold Revitalizing Mist, 24K Gold Oil for Intimate Skin, Artist’s brush, and Gold diffusing palette for intimate skin care.

“Beauty from the inside out” is the famous quote that signifies the mission of Drs. Kimble, creating, enhancing, and rejuvenating the internal intimate beauty. As Drs. Kimble often say, “Elegance is when the inside is as beautiful as the outside,” and the Kimble Center is dedicated to helping patients radiate that beauty in all its glory.

The Sonnet 79 product line complements the surgical center’s offerings, as Drs. Kimble are gifted with the surgical talent to create the impossible, while Sonnet 79 provides the nourishment, protection, and boosts skin cell renewal to maintain intimate beauty.

To learn more about the Kimble Center for Intimate Cosmetic Surgery and the Sonnet 79 product line, visit their website or follow them on social media. Stay tuned for upcoming promotional events and special offers that will allow you to experience the exquisite care provided by the Kimble Center.

About the Kimble Center for Intimate Cosmetic Surgery: The Kimble Center for Intimate Cosmetic Surgery, led by Drs. David and Alexis May Kimble, is a state-of-the-art surgical center offering a wide array of intimate cosmetic procedures and luxurious skin care products. Located in Beverly Hills, California, the center is committed to providing comprehensive intimate care and celebrating feminine beauty.

Contact:

Kimble Center for Intimate Cosmetic Surgery 421 N Beverly Drive, Suite 260 Beverly Hills, CA 90210 (310) 563-7332 https://www.kimblecenterforpelvicwellness.com/

Tyler Barnett
TBPR
email us here
